abstract: Abandoning its effort to buy the London exchange would allow Nasdaq to focus on its bid for the Swedish exchange operator OMX, where it faces a challenge from Borse Dubai.
snippet: Abandoning its effort to buy the London exchange would allow Nasdaq to focus on its bid for the Swedish exchange operator OMX, where it faces a challenge from Borse Dubai.
lead_paragraph: LONDON, Aug. 20  Nasdaq put its stake in the London Stock Exchange up for sale Monday, ending a year-and-a-half-long attempt to buy the rival  one that has included a hostile bid, a dawn raid and a 48-page public defense circular.

headline.main: Nasdaq to Sell Stake in London Exchange
headline.print_headline: Nasdaq, Its Overtures Scorned, Says It Will Sell Its Stake in the London Exchange
